message:
Glad to be in Devbhoomi Uttarakhand. Will inaugurate a key infrastructure project, the Char Dham highway development programme. 

Char Dham highway project will lead to creation of over 900 km of roads. Connectivity & tourism will get a strong boost through the project. Adding of bypasses, tunnels, bridges & flyovers will ease travel. Proper slope stabilisation will ensure protection against landslides.
